trans-unit.source: Defines the behavior for an extender control.
trans-unit.target: 定义扩展程序控件的行为。

trans-unit.source: Extender controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl> class require a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control to be on the page.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的扩展程序控件<xref:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl>类要求<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件，使其在页上。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl> base class performs an explicit test to make sure that a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control exists on the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl>基类执行显式测试，确保<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>页上存在的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl>

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to create extender controls and the page does not contain an <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control, you can create a class that implements the IExtenderControl interface directly.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你想要创建扩展程序控件和页不包含<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件，你可以创建直接实现 IExtenderControl 接口的类。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, if you are creating a class that derives from <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> or you are extending an existing control that derives from <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>, you can implement the IExtenderControl interface to support client functionality.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果您创建派生自类<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>或扩展现有控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>，则可以实现 IExtenderControl 接口以支持客户端功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: The IExtenderControl interface registers the script libraries for a control by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl.GetScriptReferences%2A> method, and it registers <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> objects by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl.GetScriptDescriptors%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: IExtenderControl 接口通过调用注册的控件的脚本库<xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl.GetScriptReferences%2A>方法，并注册<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor>对象通过调用<xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl.GetScriptDescriptors%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl.GetScriptDescriptors%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> </xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl.GetScriptReferences%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl.GetScriptDescriptors%2A> method returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> list of <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl.GetScriptDescriptors%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>列表<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl.GetScriptDescriptors%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you extend an existing control type that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class, implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果你扩展现有控件类型是派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>类中，实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: To create an extender control by implementing IExtenderControl, you do the following: - Write code for the control's `OnInit` event to detect and use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control if it is available on the page.
trans-unit.target: 若要通过实现 IExtenderControl 创建扩展程序控件，你可以执行以下操作:-为控件的编写代码`OnInit`事件来检测并使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制是否在页上可用。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> is not available on the page, provide alternative means to register required scripts by calling static methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>不可用的页上，提供的替代项是指通过调用静态方法的<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>注册所需的脚本</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: - Provide protected virtual members for IExtenderControl members.
trans-unit.target: -为 IExtenderControl 成员提供受保护虚拟成员。

trans-unit.source: - Provide instance script as a script block that you register with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: -为你注册的脚本块提供实例脚本<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: You must do this during the control's `PreRender`, `PreRenderComplete`, or `Render` events.
trans-unit.target: 必须执行此操作在控件的过程`PreRender`， `PreRenderComplete`，或`Render`事件。

trans-unit.source: - Register the script descriptors during the control's `Render` event.
trans-unit.target: -在控件的期间注册脚本描述符`Render`事件。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the page contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control, the page must contain a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果页包含<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件，必须包含页<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: You must implement the IExtenderControl interface only when the page does not contain a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 仅当不包含页上，则必须实现 IExtenderControl 接口<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: Registers the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects for the control and returns an object that contains the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects for the control.
trans-unit.target: 注册<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref>控件对象，并返回一个对象，包含<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref>控件的对象。

trans-unit.source: The server control that the extender is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 扩展相关联的服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection that contains <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>集合，其中包含<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Registers the script libraries for the control and returns an enumeration of ECMAScript (JavaScript) files that have been registered as embedded resources.
trans-unit.target: 注册控件的脚本库，并返回作为嵌入资源已注册的 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 文件的枚举。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection that contains JavaScript files that have been registered as embedded resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>集合，其中包含已注册为的 JavaScript 文件嵌入资源。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>
